pull.title: depends: systemtap 4.8
pull.body:
Updates systemtap to 4.8.
Includes acc2895a66a4b654e9a0a05ed0927f67f48c75b2 from #25972.
Will half (depends) fix #26916.

Release notes etc: https://lwn.net/Articles/913908/.

events.body:

If your review is incorrectly listed, please react with 👎 to this comment and the bot will ignore it on the next update.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#25972](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25972) (build: no-longer disable WARN_CXXFLAGS when CXXFLAGS is set by fanquake)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

events.body:
ACK a91379359daca24b83b5e98714ec2fda93f24185

Changes to the depends look good. Hash matches with what I get.

 > Release notes etc: https://lwn.net/Articles/913908/.

[sourceware.org/PR29246](https://sourceware.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=29246) is relevant to us which is the only [commit](https://sourceware.org/git/?p=systemtap.git;a=commitdiff;h=97213111b28685bf5f3edad5ec9e8bca397e8a5f;hp=6f6f15a002da7a05e64ef24047399688809895b2) changing the `includes/sys/sdt.h` file. But it shouldn't affect our use of sdt.h.

I've [previously checked](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25972#issuecomment-1246700093) that removing the [problematic]() variadic in a patch does not cause any problems for us as we don't use it. This also doesn't conflict with https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26593 as we use a different variadic there.

> Updates systemtap to 4.8.
> Includes [acc2895](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/acc2895a66a4b654e9a0a05ed0927f67f48c75b2) from #25972.
> Will half (depends) fix #26916.

Not able to reproduce #26916 when building with depends on the master branch on Ubuntu 22.10:
```
$ make -C depends NO_QT=1 NO_WALLET=1 NO_ZMQ=1 NO_UPNP=1 NO_NATPMP=1
$ ./autogen.sh
$ ./configure CONFIG_SITE=$PWD/depends/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/share/config.site CC=clang CXX=clang++
$ make clean
$ make
$ clang --version
Ubuntu clang version 15.0.2-1
Target: x86_64-pc-linux-gnu
Thread model: posix
InstalledDir: /usr/bin
```

Is it a result of bumping to 4.8?

> Is it a result of bumping

No it's probably because you don't have any warnings turned on.

> > Is it a result of bumping
> 
> No it's probably because you don't have any warnings turned on.

Right... :man_facepalming:

events.message: depends: systemtap: remove variadic params that trigger compiler warnings

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,13 @@
+diff --git a/includes/sys/sdt.h b/includes/sys/sdt.h
+index 4075a5f..7c6138c 100644
+--- a/includes/sys/sdt.h
++++ b/includes/sys/sdt.h
+@@ -278,7 +278,7 @@ __extension__ extern unsigned long long __sdt_unsp;

@@ -0,0 +1,13 @@
+diff --git a/includes/sys/sdt.h b/includes/sys/sdt.h
+index 4075a5f..7c6138c 100644
+--- a/includes/sys/sdt.h
++++ b/includes/sys/sdt.h
+@@ -278,7 +278,7 @@ __extension__ extern unsigned long long __sdt_unsp;
+   _SDT_ASM_1(.purgem _SDT_TYPE_)					      \
+   _SDT_ASM_1(.purgem _SDT_TYPE)
+ 
+-#define _SDT_ASM_BODY(provider, name, pack_args, args, ...)		      \
++#define _SDT_ASM_BODY(provider, name, pack_args, args)		            \
comments.body: Add a comment that this patch can be dropped after switching to [C++20](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/26916#issuecomment-1400239451)?
